T01rahppsau:0: PADA MARKERS For a four-pada verse:
T01rahppsau:2: Rāhulabhadra: Prajñāpāramitāstotra nirvikalpe namas tubhyaṃ $ prajñāpāramite 'mite &
T01rahppsau:3: yā tvaṃ sarvānavadyāṅgi % niravadyair nirīkṣyase // RahPps_1 //
T01rahppsau:5: yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena % sa paśyati tathāgatam // RahPps_2 //
T01rahppsau:6: tava cārye guṇāḍhyāyā $ buddhasya ca jagadguroḥ &
T01rahppsau:7: na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś % candracandrikayor iva // RahPps_3 //
T01rahppsau:10: sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe $ yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate &
T01rahppsau:13: poṣikā janayitrī ca % mātā tvam asi vatsalā // RahPps_6 //
T01rahppsau:14: yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ $ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ &
T01rahppsau:15: tena tvam api kalyāṇi % sarvasattvapitāmahī // RahPps_7 //
T01rahppsau:18: vineyaṃ janam āsādya $ tatra tatra tathāgataiḥ &
T01rahppsau:19: bahurūpā tvam evaikā % nānānāmabhir īḍyase // RahPps_9 //
T01rahppsau:21: tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti % doṣā vādāś ca vādinām // RahPps_10 //
T01rahppsau:24: yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas $ tvannāthasya na vidyate &
T01rahppsau:25: tasyāmba katham anyatra % rāgadveṣau bhaviṣyataḥ // RahPps_12 //
T01rahppsau:26: nāgacchasi kutaś cit tvaṃ $ na ca kva cana gacchasi &
T01rahppsau:27: sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu % vidvadbhir nopalabhyase // RahPps_13 //
T01rahppsau:28: ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti $ prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ &
T01rahppsau:29: prapadya ca vimucyante % tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam // RahPps_14 //
T01rahppsau:30: tvām eva badhyate paśyann $ apaśyann api badhyate &
T01rahppsau:31: tvām eva mucyate paśyann % apaśyann api mucyate // RahPps_15 //
T01rahppsau:33: sudurbodhāsi māyeva % dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase // RahPps_16 //
T01rahppsau:34: buddhaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiś ca $ śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā &
T01rahppsau:35: mārgas tvam ekā mokṣasya % nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ // RahPps_17 //
T01rahppsau:37: kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam % ucyase ca na cocyase // RahPps_18 //
T01rahppsau:38: śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ $ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām &
T01rahppsau:39: sarvavāgviśayātītāṃ % yā tvaṃ kva cid aniśritā // RahPps_19 //
T01rahppsau:40: saty evam api saṃvṛtyā $ vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ &
T01rahppsau:41: tvām astutyām api satīṃ % tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāḥ // RahPps_20 //
T01rahppsau:43: tenāstv āśu jagat kṛtsnaṃ % prajñāpāraparāyaṇam // RahPps_21 //
